meanings.sent1: The kind chef victualed the hungry travelers with delicious meals.
meanings.sent2: The ship was victualed with enough food for the long journey.
meanings.sent3: The picnic basket victualed a feast fit for a king.
meanings.sent4: Her words victualed comfort to his troubled heart.
meanings.sent5: The garden victualed a bounty of fresh vegetables for the family.

meanings.definition: Provided with food or other supplies.
meanings.sent1: The victualed army marched confidently into battle.
meanings.sent2: The explorers were victualed for their expedition into the unknown.
meanings.sent3: The well-victualed pantry made meal preparation a breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her victualed backpack held all the necessary gear for the hike.
meanings.sent5: The victualed shelter offered refuge to the weary travelers.
